event.description: Jose Reyes flies out to right fielder Jeff Francoeur.
Daniel Murphy flies out to center fielder Jordan Schafer.
Carlos Beltran walks.
Carlos Delgado called out on strikes.
David Wright strikes out swinging.
Ryan Church grounds out to first baseman Casey Kotchman.
Ramon Castro strikes out swinging.
Luis Castillo flies out to left fielder Brandon Jones.
John Maine strikes out swinging.
Jose Reyes walks.
With Daniel Murphy batting, Jose Reyes steals (5) 2nd base.
Daniel Murphy walks.
Carlos Beltran strikes out swinging.
Carlos Delgado strikes out swinging.
David Wright doubles (6) on a fly ball to center fielder Jordan Schafer.
Ryan Church grounds out, second baseman Kelly Johnson to first baseman Casey Kotchman. David Wright to 3rd.
Ramon Castro grounds out, third baseman Chipper Jones to first baseman Casey Kotchman.
Luis Castillo grounds out, shortstop Yunel Escobar to first baseman Casey Kotchman.
John Maine strikes out swinging.
Jose Reyes grounds out, second baseman Kelly Johnson to first baseman Casey Kotchman.
Daniel Murphy singles on a line drive to center fielder Jordan Schafer.
Carlos Beltran homers (3) on a fly ball to center field. Daniel Murphy scores.
Carlos Delgado singles on a fly ball to left fielder Brandon Jones.
David Wright homers (2) on a fly ball to center field. Carlos Delgado scores.
Ryan Church strikes out swinging.
Ramon Castro pops out to catcher David Ross in foul territory.
Luis Castillo grounds out, pitcher Javier Vazquez to first baseman Casey Kotchman.
Offensive Substitution: Pinch-hitter Alex Cora replaces John Maine.
Alex Cora singles on a ground ball to center fielder Jordan Schafer.
Jose Reyes ground bunts into a force out, pitcher Javier Vazquez to shortstop Yunel Escobar. Alex Cora out at 2nd. Jose Reyes to 1st.
Daniel Murphy flies out to center fielder Jordan Schafer.
Carlos Beltran homers (4) on a fly ball to center field. Jose Reyes scores.
Pitching Change: Eric O'Flaherty replaces Javier Vazquez, batting 9th.
Carlos Delgado grounds out, second baseman Kelly Johnson to first baseman Casey Kotchman.
Pitching Change: Peter Moylan replaces Eric O'Flaherty, batting 9th, replacing Greg Norton.
David Wright grounds out, shortstop Yunel Escobar to first baseman Casey Kotchman.
Ryan Church called out on strikes.
Ramon Castro grounds out, third baseman Chipper Jones to first baseman Casey Kotchman.
Pitching Change: Jeff Bennett replaces Peter Moylan, batting 9th.
Luis Castillo grounds out, second baseman Kelly Johnson to first baseman Casey Kotchman.
Offensive Substitution: Pinch-hitter Gary Sheffield replaces J. Putz.
Gary Sheffield walks.
With Jose Reyes batting, Gary Sheffield picked off and caught stealing 2nd base, pitcher Jeff Bennett to first baseman Casey Kotchman to shortstop Yunel Escobar.
Jose Reyes singles on a line drive to right fielder Jeff Francoeur.
With Daniel Murphy batting, Jose Reyes steals (6) 2nd base.
Daniel Murphy grounds out, second baseman Kelly Johnson to first baseman Casey Kotchman.
Kelly Johnson flies out to left fielder Daniel Murphy.
Yunel Escobar strikes out swinging.
Chipper Jones walks.
Casey Kotchman flies out to right fielder Ryan Church.
Jeff Francoeur singles on a line drive to center fielder Carlos Beltran.
Brandon Jones walks. Jeff Francoeur to 2nd.
David Ross walks. Jeff Francoeur to 3rd. Brandon Jones to 2nd.
Jordan Schafer strikes out swinging.

Javier Vazquez grounds into a force out, shortstop Jose Reyes to second baseman Luis Castillo. Jeff Francoeur scores. Brandon Jones scores. David Ross out at 2nd. Javier Vazquez advances to 1st, on a throwing error by second baseman Luis Castillo.
Kelly Johnson walks. Javier Vazquez to 2nd.
Yunel Escobar singles on a soft fly ball to center fielder Carlos Beltran. Javier Vazquez scores. Kelly Johnson to 2nd.
Chipper Jones flies out to left fielder Daniel Murphy.
Casey Kotchman strikes out swinging.
Jeff Francoeur grounds out, first baseman Carlos Delgado to pitcher John Maine.
Brandon Jones strikes out swinging.
David Ross strikes out swinging.
Jordan Schafer flies out to right fielder Ryan Church.
Javier Vazquez strikes out swinging.
Kelly Johnson grounds out to first baseman Carlos Delgado.
Yunel Escobar walks.
Chipper Jones lines out to left fielder Daniel Murphy.
With Casey Kotchman batting, Yunel Escobar caught stealing 2nd base, catcher Ramon Castro to shortstop Jose Reyes.
Casey Kotchman singles on a sharp ground ball to center fielder Carlos Beltran.
Jeff Francoeur pops out to second baseman Luis Castillo.
Brandon Jones walks. Casey Kotchman to 2nd.
David Ross out on a sacrifice bunt, third baseman David Wright to first baseman Carlos Delgado. Casey Kotchman to 3rd. Brandon Jones to 2nd.
Jordan Schafer strikes out swinging.
Pitching Change: Bobby Parnell replaces John Maine, batting 9th, replacing Alex Cora.
Offensive Substitution: Pinch-hitter Greg Norton replaces Eric O'Flaherty.
Greg Norton walks.
Kelly Johnson grounds into a double play, shortstop Jose Reyes to second baseman Luis Castillo to first baseman Carlos Delgado. Greg Norton out at 2nd.
Yunel Escobar flies out to right fielder Ryan Church.
Pitching Change: J. Putz replaces Bobby Parnell, batting 9th.
Chipper Jones homers (3) on a fly ball to right field.
Casey Kotchman grounds out, shortstop Jose Reyes to first baseman Carlos Delgado.
Jeff Francoeur strikes out swinging.
Brandon Jones singles on a line drive to left fielder Daniel Murphy.
David Ross strikes out swinging.
Pitching Change: Francisco Rodriguez replaces J. Putz, batting 2nd, replacing left fielder Daniel Murphy.
Defensive Substitution: Jeremy Reed replaces Gary Sheffield, batting 9th, playing left field.
Jordan Schafer strikes out swinging.
Offensive Substitution: Pinch-hitter Omar Infante replaces Jeff Bennett.
Omar Infante pops out to shortstop Jose Reyes.
Kelly Johnson flies out to center fielder Carlos Beltran.
